method.text: Melt the butter in a large saucepan or flameproof casserole. Add the lamb and saute over a high heat for 5-8 min or until browned on all sides. Remove the lamb from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and saute for 2-3 min or until softened. Stir in the cayenne pepper and coriander and cook for 1 min. Add the swede and cook for 3 min.
Return the lamb to the pan. Pour in the stock. Season to taste. Bring to the boil, Cover and simmer gently for 1 hour or until Iamb is nearly tender.
Add the apricots, chickpeas and leeks to the pan and cook for 30 min or until tender. Adjust seasoning and serve.

title: Lamb and apricot hot pot
